title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: When importing a new image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view, the image is not refreshed and the original image remains displayed.
EB: After importing a new image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view, the image should be refreshed and the new image should be displayed instead of the original image.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Import a new image called 'image1.jpg' into the layout view. 2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image. 3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'. 4. Import the renamed 'image1.jpg' into the layout view again.
